profile:
Edmonton's Most Trusted Roofing Company

Now with 370+ online reviews and celebrating 10 years in business. Highest rated Homestars company in Edmonton.

Our reputation in the roofing industry is important to us and we therefore strive to ensure your experience with us is both professional and satisfying.
We have won a number of awards in the industry including the Best of HomeStars award 9 years in a row (2014-2022). We are also a proud member of the AARA (Alberta Allied Roofing Association), BBB (Better Business Bureau), and a Malarkey Certified Roofer. 
We are experienced in thinking outside the box and are well equipped with our experience in the industry to solve the most difficult of projects. At Fair and Square Roofing, we pride ourselves in retaining our belief in excellent “old fashioned” customer service.  Here you can speak directly with the business owner, Dominik Plaza, at any time who will manage each project from start to finish.

Great Canadian is a fully integrated residential and commercial renovation company dedicated to providing sustainable energy solutions for your home or commercial property.

Experienced, professional and trusted, Great Canadian will provide you with the right advice, quality workmanship, excellent service and the best brands of products no matter what your need. All services are competitively priced for your project and include roofing, attic insulation, siding, windows and doors, soffits and fascia, eavestroughs and any related insurance needs. Great Canadian combines skill and technology to provide you the best service possible.

profile:
Reid’s Roofing and Insulation has served residential and commercial customers in the Edmonton region for the past 12 years. Our owner, Jessica Reid is a hands on entrepreneur who has made it her mission to lead positive change within the roofing industry. Reid’s is different in that we consider the wellbeing of your entire home’s building envelop. We are a one stop shop offering all types roofing solutions, attic insulation, eaves troughs, soffits, downspouts and exterior paneling. We’ve been the winner of the Homestars “best of” in the roofing category for the past 7 years and we currently hold a 97% customer satisfaction score. We rate highest in the reputation and responsiveness categories. We are the experts in our field and you can expect honesty, integrity and a desire to serve from every Reid’s team member

Whatever your roofing needs, give us a call today for a free no-obligation in home consultation ! We’re here to serve you, pick up the phone or email us today. We would be happy to hear from you!

profile:
Itz Roofing is a family owned and operated roofing company that services Edmonton and area. Our company was established after recognizing a need for a more reliable roofing company that understands not just your roof, but the impact to the entire building longevity. With many years of construction and roofing experience, you can trust you will receive a great roof from professionals who are both knowledgeable and practiced.

We only use the highest quality roofing materials and always provide professional workmanship to ensure your roofing project completed by Itz Roofing will be done right.

Itz Roofing Ltd provides roofing services in Edmonton, St Albert, Spruce Grove, Stony Plain, Sherwood Park, Leduc, Beaumont, Parkland County, Sturgeon County, and other surrounding areas. 

Visit us at www.itzroofing.com to learn more!

profile:
Jayson Global has always been a family-run business serving Edmonton and the greater area since the late 1980's.  

Jayson Global provides roofing, siding, windows & doors for homeowners, home builders, development companies, property management and insurance companies in Edmonton and the surrounding area.  Our certified tradesmen have up to 40 years of experience and can handle any size job effectively and efficiently.  We are fully bonded, covered by worker’s compensation, and we carry a $5,000,000 liability insurance policy. We are proud members of the Edmonton Construction Association, Edmonton Region Home Builders’ Association, and the Better Business Bureau.  

We complete hundreds of projects every year and over 95% of our customers would recommend our service to their family and friends.

profile:
Residential Roofing Specialists with 100+ Roofs Completed & 100% Client Satisfaction Rating  -  Now Offering Low Monthly Payment Options!
.
.
WHY CHOOSE PEMBINA ROOFING?
.
.
____________________________

QUALITY ASSURED

Taking pride in the quality of our work, we provide all our clients with our 5-year workmanship guarantee in addition to the manufacturers' warranty.
____________________________

FULLY COVERED

Taking Equipped with $2 million dollar liability insurance & owner’s WCB coverage, our clients can rest assured that they are 100% protected if an accident ever occurs. However, thanks to our systematic safety program, we're proud to report we've NEVER had a safety incident on one of our sites.
____________________________

HIGHLY EXPERIENCED

With over 20 years and hundreds of roofs delivered successfully, our team is seasoned in handling projects no matter how small, large, or complicated they may be.
____________________________

UNMATCHABLE CUSTOMER SERVICE

As owners of the company, we believe in self-performing all our projects – never subcontracting. By prioritizing our quality over speed, we commit to providing our clients with both a reliable high-quality roof and full transparency into the work we perform.
____________________________
.
.
OUR PROCESS
.
.
____________________________

1. WE LISTEN

Once you've reached out to us through our website, email, or phone call, the first thing our team will do is listen. During this stage, we will be ensuring we have a strong understanding of what the project will require. Once we're confident we have the necessary details for your project, we will request to schedule a date that accommodates your schedule so we can complete a thorough inspection of your roof.
____________________________

2.  WE INSPECT & COMMUNICATE

On the scheduled date/time of your roof inspection, our team will arrive and briefly speak with you about the project. During this time, you can fill us in on any further details pertaining to your roof. Following the conversation, our team will complete a thorough roof inspection (15-30mins). Throughout this inspection, we will measure your roof and assess for any risks of leaks.
 
After completing the inspection, our team will provide you with our professional recommendation on whether you should replace or repair, your roof. Please feel free to ask any questions you may have, we want to ensure you understand what we’re doing, and why we’re doing it. Following this, we will provide you with a detailed cost estimate for performing the recommended work. Once you've signed and agreed to the quote, we will schedule a date that accommodates your schedule to complete the work.
____________________________

3.  WE EXECUTE

On the scheduled date, our team will arrive in the morning with our dump trailer and equipment. Please note, you may want to avoid being home during the day, while we try our best to avoid it, roofing can, unfortunately, be quite loud from the inside. 

​When completing your roof replacement or installation, we stick to our processes, take our time, and ensure you're provided with the highest quality of service and roofing system. Typical roof replacements will take one to three days depending upon the project size.
____________________________

4.  WE FOLLOW UP

After completing the roof we will come down and finish our thorough ground-up clean-up, using our large magnet we will clean loose nails and ensure your yard is as clean, or cleaner, than when we arrived.  Once the work is done, we will have a final follow-up conversation with you. During this time will go over the project, show you photos, and ensure you're fully satisfied with the work performed before we leave. 

If you have any further questions about your roof after we've left, our staff is always available and happy to chat! 
____________________________

Balance Roofing is here to help with all your roofing needs. We offer a variety of services such as: asphalt sloped roofing, sloped roof re sheeting, metal roofing, asphalt repair, metal and tile repair.

Covid 19 Update: We are following all the health and safety guidelines and wearing PPE and social distancing.

profile:
We are an Edmonton Roofing company that provides residential roofing services to the Greater Edmonton Area. Our services include roof replacement (asphalt, rubber, cedar), roof repairs, and new construction. We offer additional services for eavestrough, soffit & fascia, and skylight replacement and installation. 

Safe Roofing's top priorities are to understand your family's needs, effectively communicate throughout the roofing process, and deliver dependable roofing services. Our goal is 100% customer satisfaction.
